definition: adenine nucleotide (A, pairs with thymine T 胸腺嘧啶 in DNA and with uracil U 尿嘧啶 in RNA)
guanine nucleotide (G, pairs with cytosine C 胞嘧啶 in DNA and RNA)

pinyin: xian4 piao4 ling4 he2 gan1 san1 lin2 suan1

sentences.english: Characters and applications of xanthine oxidase of cow milk were described.
sentences.chinese: 綜述了牛乳中黃嘌呤氧化酶的各種性質及其應用。

sentences.english: Tungstate competitively inhibits the utilization of molybdenum for the formation of xanthine dehydrogenases.
sentences.chinese: 鎢酸鹽競爭性地抑制鉬的利用以形成黃嘌呤脫氫酶。

sentences.english: The absorption methods of purine compounds in beer by several kinds of absorbents had been developed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了幾種吸附劑對啤酒中嘌呤類物質吸附的方法。

sentences.english: Gout is caused by abnormal metabolism of purine.
sentences.chinese: 痛風是由於嘌呤代謝異常引起的疾病。

sentences.english: The method was applied to determine 6-MP in tablets with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 該法已用於片劑中的巰嘌呤含量的測定。

sentences.english: It is uncertain whether methylxanthines have long-term effects on neurodevelopment and growth.
sentences.chinese: 甲基黃嘌呤對神經發育和生長的長期影響還不確定。

sentences.english: Also the dampness and heat can cause the disorder of the purine metabolism in human body.
sentences.chinese: 而溼熱也是影響人體內嘌呤代謝紊亂的根本因素。

sentences.english: These results indicated that HX is an efficient inhibitor on mouse oocyt…
sentences.chinese: 結果顯示，次黃嘌呤是一種有效的生髮泡破裂抑制劑。

sentences.english: Tungstate competitively inhibits the utilization of molybdenum for the formation of xanthine dehydrogenases .
sentences.chinese: 鎢酸鹽競爭性地抑制鉬的利用以形成黃嘌呤脫氫酶。

sentences.english: Uric acid as the end-product of purine metabolism in human body is excreted through kidney.
sentences.chinese: 尿酸是人體嘌呤鹼基分解代謝終產物，經腎臟排泄。

sentences.english: The antibiotic-resistant transfected cells were selected and enriched by applying puromycin in culture medium.
sentences.chinese: 採用嘌呤黴素篩選和富集轉染具有抗性的細胞。

sentences.english: Puromycin dihydrochloride has been formulated as a salt to achieve higher water solubility.
sentences.chinese: 爲提高其水溶性，二鹽酸嘌呤黴素設計成其鹽的形態。

sentences.english: METHODS The deficiency of kidney-yang model of male mouse was induced by adenine.
sentences.chinese: 方法用腺嘌呤製備腎陽虛小鼠模型。

sentences.english: Uric acid is a final product of metabolic block of purin metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 尿酸是嘌呤代謝的終產物。

sentences.english: SOD total activity was detected by xanthine oxidase.
sentences.chinese: SOD試劑盒採用黃嘌呤氧化酶法測其總活力。

sentences.english: The change of allopurinol's group was not obvious.
sentences.chinese: 別嘌呤醇組改變不明顯。

definition: catabolism (biology)/metabolic breaking down and waste disposal/dissimilation
